### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1855">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1856">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1857">De functie Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1857">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1858">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1858">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1859">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1859">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1995">Canada health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1995">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1996">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1996">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1997">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1997">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1998">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1998">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-1999">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2000">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2000">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2001">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2001">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2002">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2002">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2003">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2004">De normale expressie Regex_canada_health_service_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2004">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2005">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_health_service_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2005">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2017">Canada-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2017">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2018">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2019">twee hoofdletters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2019">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2020">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2021">twee hoofdletters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2022">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2023">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2023">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2024">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2025">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2026">De normale expressie Regex_canada_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2026">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2027">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_passport_number of Keyword_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2027">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2057">Canada Personal Health Identification Number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2057">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2058">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2059">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2059">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2060">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2061">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2062">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2063">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2064">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2065">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2065">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2066">De normale expressie Regex_canada_phin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2066">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2067">Er worden ten minste twee trefwoorden Keyword_canada_phin of Keyword_canada_provinces gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2067">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2100">Canada social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2100">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2101">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2102">negen cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2102">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2103">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2104">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2104">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2105">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2105">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2106">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2106">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2107">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2108">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2109">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2109">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2110">Niet-opgemaakt: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2110">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2111">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2112">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2113">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2114">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2114">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2115">De functie Func_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2115">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2116">Ten minste twee van de volgende patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2116">At least two of the following patterns:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2117">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2117">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2118">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin_collaborative gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2118">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2119">Met de Func_eu_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2119">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2120">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2120">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2121">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2122">De functie Func_unformatted_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2122">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2123">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2123">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2124">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2149">Chili-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2149">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2150">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2151">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens van een vinkje of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2151">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2152">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2153">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2154">Ã©Ã©n tot twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2154">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2155">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2155">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2156">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2156">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2157">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2158">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2159">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2159">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2160">een cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive) dat is een controlecijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2160">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2161">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2162">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2162">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2163">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2164">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2164">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2165">De functie Func_chile_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2165">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2168">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2169">De functie Func_chile_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2169">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2207">China Resident Identity Card (PRC) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2207">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2208">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2209">18 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2209">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2210">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2211">18 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2211">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2212">zes cijfers die een adrescode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2212">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2213">acht cijfers in het formulier YYYYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2213">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2214">drie cijfers die een ordercode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2214">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2215">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2215">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2217">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2218">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2219">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2220">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2220">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2221">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_china_resident_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2221">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2222">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2223">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2223">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2224">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2224">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2225">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2226">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2226">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2238">Creditcardnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2239">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2240">14 tot 16 cijfers die kunnen worden opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt (dddddd) en die de Luhn-toets moeten doorstaan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2241">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2242">Detecteert kaarten van alle grote merken wereldwijd, waaronder Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, cadeaukaarten en dinerkaarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2243">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2244">Ja, de Luhn-checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2245">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2246">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2247">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2248">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2249">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_verification gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2250">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2251">Met de Func_expiration_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2252">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2253">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2254">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2255">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2515">Nummer van het rijbewijs van KroatiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2516">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2517">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2518">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2519">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2519">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2521">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2521">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2522">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2523">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2524">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2525">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2649">Nummer van kroatische identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2649">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2650">Deze entiteit is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU National Identification Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2651">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2652">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2653">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2654">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2655">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2656">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2657">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2658">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2659">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2660">Met de Func_croatia_id_card wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2661">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_croatia_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2692">KroatiÃ«-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2693">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2694">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2695">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2696">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2696">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2697">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2698">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2698">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2699">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2700">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2701">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2702">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2703">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2704">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2705">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2706">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2724">OIB-nummer (Persoonlijke identificatie van KroatiÃ«)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2725">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2726">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2727">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2728">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2729">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2729">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2730">laatste cijfer is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2732">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2733">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2734">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2735">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2736">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2737">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2738">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2739">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2740">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2772">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2773">12 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2774">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2775">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2775">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2776">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2777">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2777">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2778">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2779">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2780">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2781">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2906">Cyprus-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2906">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2907">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2907">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2908">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2908">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2909">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2909">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2910">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2910">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2911">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2911">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2912">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2912">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2913">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2914">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2915">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2916">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2916">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2917">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2918">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2918">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2919">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2920">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2921">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2922">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2923">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2927">kimlik-karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2927">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2928">nationaal identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2928">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2929">persoonlijk id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2929">personal id number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2931">Cyprus paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2932">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2933">een letter gevolgd door 6-8 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2934">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2935">een letter gevolgd door zes tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2936">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2937">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2937">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2938">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2939">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2940">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2941">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2942">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` indeling DD/MM/YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2943">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2944">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2945">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2946">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2947">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2947">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2948">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2948">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2949">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2949">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2950">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2950">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2974">Btw-nummer cyprus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2975">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2976">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2977">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2978">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2979">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2980">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2981">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2982">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2983">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2984">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2985">een '0' of '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2986">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2987">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2988">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2989">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2989">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2990">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2991">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2992">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2993">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2994">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-2995">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3023">Tsjechisch rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3024">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3025">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3026">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3027">acht letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3028">letter 'E' (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3029">een brief</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3030">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3031">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3032">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3033">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3033">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3034">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3035">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3036">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3037">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3163">Tsjechisch paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3164">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3165">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3166">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3167">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3168">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3169">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3169">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3170">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3171">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3172">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3173">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3174">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3175">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3176">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3177">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3199">Tsjechisch persoonlijk identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3200">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3201">negen cijfers met optionele slash (oude opmaak) 10 cijfers met optionele slash vooruit (nieuwe indeling)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3202">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3203">negen cijfers (oude notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3204">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3205">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3206">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3207">10 cijfers (nieuwe indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3208">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3209">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3210">vier cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3211">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3212">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3213">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3214">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3215">De functie Func_czech_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3216">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_czech_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3217">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3218">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3219">De functie Func_czech_id_card_new_format inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3220">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3267">Het rijbewijsnummer van Denemarken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3268">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3269">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3270">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3271">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3271">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3272">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3273">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3274">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3275">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3276">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-3277">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
