## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5869">India permanent accountnummer (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5870">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5871">10 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5872">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5873">10 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5874">Drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5875">Een letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5876">Een brief</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5877">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5878">Een letter die een alfabetisch controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5879">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5880">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5881">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5882">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5883">De normale expressie Regex_india_permanent_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5884">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_india_permanent_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5885">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5886">De normale expressie Regex_india_permanent_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5892">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5893">12 cijfers met optionele spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5894">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5895">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5896">Een cijfer dat niet 0 of 1 is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5897">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5898">Een optionele spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5899">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5900">Een optionele spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5901">Het laatste cijfer, dat het controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5902">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5903">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5904">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5905">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5906">Met de Func_india_aadhaar wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5907">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_india_aadhar gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5908">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5909">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5910">Met de Func_india_aadhaar wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5911">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5916">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5916">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5917">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5917">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5918">à¤à¤§à¤¾à¤°</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5918">à¤à¤§à¤¾à¤°</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5920">KTP-nummer (Indonesia Identity Card)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5921">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5922">16 cijfers met optionele perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5923">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5924">16 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5925">Provinciecode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5926">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5927">Regency of stadscode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5928">Subdistrictcode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5929">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5930">Zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, die de geboortedatum zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5931">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5932">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5933">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5934">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5935">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5936">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5937">De normale expressie Regex_indonesia_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5938">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_indonesia_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5944">Internationaal bankrekeningnummer (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5945">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5946">Landcode (twee letters) plus controlecijfers (twee cijfers) plus bbannummer (maximaal 30 tekens)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-5948">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6016">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6016">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6017">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6018">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6018">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6019">Met de Func_iban wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6019">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6020">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6020">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6021">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6021">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6022">Geen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6022">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6023">Internationale classificatie van ziektes (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6023">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6024">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6025">Woordenlijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6025">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6026">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6027">Trefwoord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6027">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6028">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6029">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6030">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6031">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6032">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_updated gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6032">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6033">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_codes gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6033">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6034">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6034">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6035">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_ bijgewerkt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6035">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6036">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6036">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6037">Elke term uit de Dictionary_icd_10_updated woordenlijst met trefwoorden, die is gebaseerd op de internationale classificatie van ziektes, tiende revisie, klinische wijziging [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6037">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6038">Dit type zoekt alleen naar de term, niet naar de verzekeringscodes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6038">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6039">Elke term uit de Dictionary_icd_10_codes woordenlijst met trefwoorden, die is gebaseerd op de internationale classificatie van ziektes, tiende revisie, klinische wijziging [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6039">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6040">Dit type zoekt alleen naar verzekeringscodes, niet naar de beschrijving.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6040">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6041">Internationale classificatie van ziektes (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6041">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6042">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6042">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6043">Woordenlijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6043">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6044">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6044">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6045">Trefwoord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6045">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6046">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6047">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6047">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6048">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6049">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6050">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_9_updated gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6050">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6051">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_9_codes gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6051">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6052">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6052">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6053">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_9_updated gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6053">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6054">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6054">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6055">Elke term uit de Dictionary_icd_9_updated woordenlijst met trefwoorden, die is gebaseerd op de internationale classificatie van ziektes, negende revisie, klinische wijziging [(ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6055">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6056">Dit type zoekt alleen naar de term, niet naar de verzekeringscodes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6056">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6057">Elke term uit de Dictionary_icd_9_codes woordenlijst met trefwoorden, die is gebaseerd op de internationale classificatie van ziektes, negende revisie, klinische wijziging [(ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6057">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6058">Dit type zoekt alleen naar verzekeringscodes, niet naar de beschrijving.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6058">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6059">IP-adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6059">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6060">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6060">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6061">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6061">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6062">Complex patroon dat bestand is voor opgemaakte (perioden) en niet-opgemaakte versies (geen perioden) van de IPv4-adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6062">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6063">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6063">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6064">Complex patroon dat bestand is voor opgemaakte IPv6-getallen (inclusief dubbele punt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6064">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6065">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6065">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6066">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6067">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6068">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6069">Voor IPv6 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6069">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6070">De normale expressie Regex_ipv6_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6070">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6071">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6071">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6072">Voor IPv4 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6072">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6073">De normale expressie Regex_ipv4_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6073">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6074">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6074">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6075">Voor IPv6 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6075">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6076">De normale expressie Regex_ipv6_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6076">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6077">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6077">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6085">Nummer van ierlands rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6085">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6086">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6087">Zes cijfers, gevolgd door vier letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6087">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6088">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6089">Zes cijfers en vier letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6089">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6090">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6090">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6091">Vier letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6091">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6092">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6093">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6093">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6094">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6095">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6096">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6096">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6097">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6097">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6221">Ierland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6221">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6222">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6223">Twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6223">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6224">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6225">Twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6225">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6226">Twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6226">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6227">Zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6227">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6228">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6229">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6230">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6231">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6231">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6232">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6232">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6233">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6234">Met de normale expressie wordt datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 01 BEA/MEI 1988) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6234">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6235">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6235">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6236">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6236">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6237">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6237">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6261">Nummer van persoonlijke openbare service (PPS) van Ierland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6261">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6262">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6263">Oude notatie (tot 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6263">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6264">zeven cijfers gevolgd door 1-2 letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6264">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6265">Nieuwe notatie (1 januari 2013 en daarna):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6265">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6266">zeven cijfers gevolgd door twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6266">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6267">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6268">Oude notatie (tot 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6268">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6269">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6269">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6270">Ã©Ã©n tot twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6270">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6271">Nieuwe notatie (1 januari 2013 en daarna):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6271">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6272">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6272">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6273">een letter (niet case-sensitive) die een alfabetisch vinkje is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6273">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6274">Een optionele letter in het bereik A-I of 'W'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6274">An optional letter in the range A-I, or âWâ</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6275">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6276">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6277">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6278">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6278">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6279">Met de Func_ireland_pps wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6279">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6280">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6280">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6281">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6282">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6282">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6283">Met de Func_ireland_pps wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6283">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6284">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6284">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6329">IsraÃ«ls bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6329">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6330">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6331">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6331">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6332">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6333">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6333">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6334">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6335">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6335">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6336">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6336">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6337">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6337">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6338">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6338">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6339">Niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6339">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6340">13 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6340">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6342">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6343">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6344">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6345">De normale expressie Regex_israel_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6345">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6346">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_israel_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6346">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6347">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6347">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6349">Bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6349">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6351">Accountnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6351">Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6353">Nationaal identificatienummer van IsraÃ«l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6353">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6354">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6355">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6356">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6357">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6357">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6358">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6359">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6359">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6360">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6361">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6362">De functie Func_israeli_national_id_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6362">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6363">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Israel_National_ID gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6363">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6364">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6364">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6383">Nummer van het rijbewijs van ItaliÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6383">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6384">Dit type entiteit is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype Eu Driver's License Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6384">This type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6385">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6385">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6386">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6387">een combinatie van 10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6387">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6388">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6389">een combinatie van 10 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6389">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6390">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6390">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6391">de letter "A" of "V" (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6391">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6392">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6392">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6393">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6393">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6394">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6395">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6396">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6397">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6398">Met de normale `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6398">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6399">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6399">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6526">Fiscale code van ItaliÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6526">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6527">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6527">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6528">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6528">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6529">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6529">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6530">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6530">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6531">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6531">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6532">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6532">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6533">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6534">een combinatie van letters en cijfers met 16 tekens in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6534">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6535">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6536">Een combinatie van 16 tekens van letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6536">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6537">drie letters die overeenkomen met de eerste drie medeklinkers in de familienaam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6537">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6538">drie letters die overeenkomen met de eerste, derde en vierde medeklinker in de voornaam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6538">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6539">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de laatste cijfers van het geboortejaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6539">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6540">een letter die overeenkomt met de letter voor de maand van de geboorte: letters worden in alfabetische volgorde gebruikt, maar alleen de letters A tot en met E, H, L, M, P, R tot en met T worden gebruikt (januari is dus A en oktober is R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6540">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birthâletters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6541">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de dag van de geboortemaand om onderscheid te maken tussen geslachten, wordt 40 toegevoegd aan de geboortedatum voor vrouwen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6541">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6542">vier cijfers die overeenkomen met de gebiedscode die specifiek is voor de gemeente waar de persoon is geboren (landcodes worden gebruikt voor het buitenland)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6542">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6543">Ã©Ã©n pariteitscijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6543">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6544">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6545">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6545">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6546">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6547">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6548">Met de  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6548">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6549">Er wordt een  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6549">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6550">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6551">Met de  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6551">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6586">ItaliÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6586">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6587">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6588">twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6588">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6589">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6590">twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6590">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6591">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6591">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6592">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6592">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6593">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6594">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6594">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6595">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6596">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6596">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6597">Met de normale  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6597">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6598">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6598">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6599">De normale expressie vindt datum in de indeling `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6599">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6600">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6601">Met de normale  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6601">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6602">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6626">#A0 #A0 #A0 #A0 #A0 #A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6626">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6627">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6627">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6628">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6628">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6629">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6629">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6630">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6630">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6631">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6631">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6632">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6632">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6633">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6634">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6634">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6635">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6636">13 tekens alfanumeriek patroon met optionele scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6636">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6637">Ik of ik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6637">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6638">T of t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6638">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6639">optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6639">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6640">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6641">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6642">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6643">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6644">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6644">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6645">Met de Func_italy_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6645">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6646">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6646">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6647">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6647">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6648">Met de Func_italy_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6648">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6649">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6649">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6653">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6653">vat#</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6656">Japans bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6656">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6657">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6658">zeven of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6658">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6659">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6660">bankrekeningnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6660">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6661">zeven of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6661">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6662">bankrekeningstakcode:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6662">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6663">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6663">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6664">een spatie of streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6664">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6665">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6665">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6666">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6667">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6667">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6668">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6669">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6670">Met de Func_jp_bank_account wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6670">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6671">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6671">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6672">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6672">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6673">De functie Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6673">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6674">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6675">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6676">Met de Func_jp_bank_account wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6676">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6677">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6677">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6678">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6678">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6679">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6679">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span></span>
