## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6724">Japans rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6724">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6725">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6726">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6726">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6727">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6728">12 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6728">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6729">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6730">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6730">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6731">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6732">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6733">Met de Func_jp_drivers_license_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6733">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6734">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6734">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6773">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6773">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6774">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6774">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6775">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6775">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6776">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6776">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6777">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6777">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6778">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6778">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6779">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6780">13-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6780">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6781">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6782">13-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6782">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6783">Ã©Ã©n cijfer van Ã©Ã©n tot negen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6783">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6784">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6784">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6785">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6786">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6786">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6787">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6788">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6789">De functie Func_japanese_my_number_corporate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6789">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6806">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6812">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6812">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6814">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6815">12-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6815">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6818">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6818">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6819">een optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6819">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6820">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6820">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6821">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6822">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6823">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6824">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6827">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6827">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6868">Japan residence card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6869">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6870">12 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6871">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6872">12 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6873">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6873">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6874">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6874">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6875">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6875">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6876">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6879">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6880">De normale expressie Regex_jp_residence_card_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6881">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_residence_card_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>


## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6890">Japans registratienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6890">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6891">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6892">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6892">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6893">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6894">11 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6894">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6895">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6896">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6896">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6897">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6898">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6898">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6899">Met de Func_jp_resident_registration_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6899">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6900">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6900">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6913">Japans sociaal verzekeringsnummer (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6914">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6915">7-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6916">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6917">7-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6918">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6918">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6919">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6920">zes cijfers OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6921">7-12 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6922">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6923">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6924">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6925">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6926">Met de Func_jp_sin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6927">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6928">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6929">Met de Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6930">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6951">Letlandse nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6952">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6953">drie letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6954">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6955">drie letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6956">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6957">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6957">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6958">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6959">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6959">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6960">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6961">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6962">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6963">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-6964">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-6964">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7088">Persoonlijke code letland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7089">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7090">11 cijfers en een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7091">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7092">Oude indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7093">11 cijfers en een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7094">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7095">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7096">een cijfer dat overeenkomt met de eeuw van geboorte ("0" voor de 19e eeuw, "1" voor de 20e eeuw en "2" voor de 21e eeuw)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7097">vier cijfers, willekeurig gegenereerd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7098">Nieuwe indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7099">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7100">Twee cijfers "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7101">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7101">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7102">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7103">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7103">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7104">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7105">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7106">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7107">Er wordt een  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7108">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7109">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7172">Letland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7173">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7174">twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7175">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7176">twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7177">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7178">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7178">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7179">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7180">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7180">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7181">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7182">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7183">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7184">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7185">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7186">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7187">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7188">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7211">Litouws rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7212">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7213">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7214">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7215">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7215">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7217">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7217">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7218">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7219">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7220">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7221">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7346">Persoonlijke code litouwen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7347">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7348">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7349">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7350">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7351">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7352">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7353">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7354">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7355">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7356">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7357">Ã©Ã©n cijfer (1-6) dat overeenkomt met het geslacht en de eeuw van de geboorte van de persoon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7358">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7359">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met het seriÃ«le getal van de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7360">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7360">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7361">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7362">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7362">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7363">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7364">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7365">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7366">Er wordt een  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7367">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7368">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7403">Litouws paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7404">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7405">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7406">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7407">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7408">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7409">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7409">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7410">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7411">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7412">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7413">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7414">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7415">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7416">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7417">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7418">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7418">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7419">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7419">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7420">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7420">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7421">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7421">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7422">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7422">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7423">paspoorten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7423">passports</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7437">Luxemburgs rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7438">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7439">zes cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7440">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7441">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7441">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7442">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7443">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7443">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7444">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7445">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7446">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7447">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7571">Luxemburgs nationaal identificatienummer (natuurlijke personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7572">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7573">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7574">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7575">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7576">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7577">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7578">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7579">13 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7580">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7581">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7581">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7582">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7582">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7583">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7583">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7584">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7585">ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7585">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7586">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7587">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7588">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7589">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7590">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7591">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7614">Luxemburgs paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7615">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7616">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7617">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7618">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7619">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7620">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7620">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7621">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7622">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7623">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7624">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7625">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7626">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7627">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7628">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7642">ausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7642">ausweisnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7660">Luxemburgs nationaal identificatienummer (niet-natuurlijke personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7661">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7662">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7662">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7663">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7664">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7664">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7665">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7666">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7666">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7667">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7667">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7668">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7669">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7669">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7670">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7671">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7672">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7672">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7673">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7674">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7674">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7675">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7676">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7677">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7678">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7679">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7680">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7720">Nummer van maleisische identificatiekaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7721">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7722">12 cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7723">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7724">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7725">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7726">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7727">Plaats-van-geboortecode met twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7728">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7729">drie willekeurige cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7729">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7730">geslachtscode met Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7732">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7733">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7734">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7735">De normale expressie Regex_malaysia_id_card_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7736">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7763">Malta-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7764">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7765">Combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7766">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7767">combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7768">twee tekens (cijfers of letters, niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7769">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7770">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7771">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7772">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7772">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7774">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7774">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7775">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7776">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7777">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7778">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7902">Malta-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7903">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7904">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7905">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7906">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7907">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7908">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7909">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7910">zeven cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7911">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7912">zeven cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n letter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7913">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7913">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7914">Ã©Ã©n letter in 'M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z' (case insensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7915">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7916">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7916">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7917">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7918">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7919">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7920">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7921">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7922">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7939">Malta-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7940">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7941">zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7942">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7943">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7943">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7945">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7946">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7947">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7948">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7949">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7950">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7951">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7952">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7953">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
