## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7973">Malta-nummer voor belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7974">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7975">Voor Maltese nationals:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7976">zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7977">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7978">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7978">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7979">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7980">Maltese nationals: zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7981">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7981">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7982">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7983">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7984">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7984">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7985">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7986">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7986">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7987">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7988">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7989">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7990">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7991">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-7992">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI)-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8026">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8027">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8028">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8029">Ã©Ã©n cijfer tussen 1 en 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8030">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8031">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8032">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8033">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8034">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8035">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8036">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8037">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8038">twee letters exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8039">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8039">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8040">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8041">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8041">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8042">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8043">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8044">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8045">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mbi_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8046">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8047">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8048">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8048">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8050">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8050">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8051">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8051">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8052">hospik zijn begunstigden #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8052">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8053">medicare beneficiary identifier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8053">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8054">hospik zijn geen begunstigden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8054">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8055">hospik zijn begunstigdennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8055">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8056">hospik zijn begunstigden #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8056">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8058">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8059">Alfanumeriek patroon van 18 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8060">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8061">vier letters (hoofdletters ongevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8062">zes cijfers die een geldige datum aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8063">een letter - H/h of M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8064">twee letters die een geldige Mexicaanse staatscode aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8065">drie letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8066">Ã©Ã©n letter of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8067">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8067">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8068">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8069">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8069">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8070">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8071">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8072">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8073">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8074">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8075">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8096">BSN-nummer (Nederlandse burgerservice)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8097">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8098">acht of negen cijfers met optionele spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8099">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8100">acht-negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8101">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8101">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8102">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8102">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8103">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8103">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8104">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8104">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8105">twee-drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8106">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8107">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8108">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8109">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8110">De functie Func_netherlands_bsn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8111">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_netherlands_bsn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8112">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8136">Nederlands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8137">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8138">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8139">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8140">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8140">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8141">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8142">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8142">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8143">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8144">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8145">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8146">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8274">Nederlands paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8274">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8275">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8276">negen letters of cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8276">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8277">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8278">negen letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8279">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8280">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8280">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8281">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8282">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8283">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8284">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8285">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8286">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8287">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8288">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8306">Btw-nummer van Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8306">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8307">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8308">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8309">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8309">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8310">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8310">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8311">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8311">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8312">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8312">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8313">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8314">negen cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8314">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8315">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8316">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8316">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8317">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8318">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8318">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8319">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8320">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8321">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8321">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8322">Er wordt een  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8322">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8323">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8324">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8324">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8362">Btw-nummer voor Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8363">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8364">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8365">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8366">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8367">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8368">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8369">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8370">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8371">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8372">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8373">N of n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8374">L of l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8375">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8376">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8377">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8378">B of b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8379">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8381">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8382">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8383">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8384">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8385">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8386">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8387">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8393">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8393">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8394">btw nÃ»mer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8394">btw nÃ»mer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8396">Nieuw-Zeelands bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8396">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8397">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8397">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8398">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8398">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8399">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8399">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8400">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8400">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8401">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8401">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8402">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8402">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8403">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8404">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8404">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8405">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8406">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8407">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8407">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8408">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8408">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8409">drie tot vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8409">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8410">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8410">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8411">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8411">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8412">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8412">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8413">twee tot drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8413">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8414">een afbreekstreester of spatie met opties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8414">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8415">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8416">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8417">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8418">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8419">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8419">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8420">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8420">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8421">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8421">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8422">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8422">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8439">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8440">alfanumeriek patroon van acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8441">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8441">two letters</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8445">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8446">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8447">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8448">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8449">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8450">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8524">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8525">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8525">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8526">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8527">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8527">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8528">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8528">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8529">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8529">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8530">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8531">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8531">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8532">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8532">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8533">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8534">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8534">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8535">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8536">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8537">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8537">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8538">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8538">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8539">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8540">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8540">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8541">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8541">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8542">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8542">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8543">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8543">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8544">ird no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8544">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8545">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8545">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8546">nieuw-Zeeland ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8546">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8547">ird-getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8547">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8548">binnenlands opbrengstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8548">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8549">Nieuw-Zeelands ministerie van gezondheid nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8549">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8550">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8551">drie letters, een spatie (optioneel) en vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8551">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8552">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8552">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8553">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), behalve 'I' en 'O'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8553">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8554">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8554">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8555">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8555">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8556">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8557">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8558">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8559">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8559">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8560">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8560">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8561">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_nz_terms gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8561">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8562">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8563">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8563">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8564">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8564">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8565">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8579">Nieuw-Zeelandse sociale zekerheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8579">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8580">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8581">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8582">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8583">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8584">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8585">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8586">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8587">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8588">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8589">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8589">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8590">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8590">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8591">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8591">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8592">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8593">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8593">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8594">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8594">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8595">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8596">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8596">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8597">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8598">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8598">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8599">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8599">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8600">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8600">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8601">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8601">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8602">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8602">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8603">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8603">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8604">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8604">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8605">sociaal welzijn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8605">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8606">sociaal welzijn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8606">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8607">sociaal welzijn Nee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8607">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8608">sociaal welzijnsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8608">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8609">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8609">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8610">Noorwegen-identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8611">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8612">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8613">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8614">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8615">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8616">individueel getal met drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8617">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8618">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8619">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8620">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8621">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8622">Met de Func_norway_id_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8623">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_norway_id_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8624">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8625">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8626">De functie Func_norway_id_numbe inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8627">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8636">Verenigd identificatienummer voor meerdere doeleinden in de Filipijnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8637">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8638">12 cijfers gescheiden door afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8639">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8640">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8641">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8641">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8642">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8642">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8643">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8643">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8644">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8644">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8645">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8646">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8647">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8648">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8649">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8650">De normale expressie Regex_philippines_unified_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8651">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_philippines_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8652">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8652">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8655">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8655">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8656">Identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8656">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8658">Licentienummer van Polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8659">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8660">14 cijfers met twee schuine schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8661">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8662">14 cijfers en twee slashes vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8663">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8663">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8664">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8665">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8666">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8667">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8667">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8669">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8670">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8671">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8672">Met de normale  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8673">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8797">Polen-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8798">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8799">drie letters en zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8800">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8801">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8802">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8803">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8804">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8805">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8806">De functie Func_polish_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8807">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8808">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8809">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>
