- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8816">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8816">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8817">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8817">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8818">besturingssysteem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8818">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8819">Nationale Polen-id (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8820">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8821">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8822">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8823">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum in de notatie YYMMDD vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8824">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8825">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8826">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8827">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8828">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8829">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8830">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8831">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_pesel_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8832">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8833">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8834">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8835">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8847">Polen paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8848">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8849">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8850">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8851">twee letters en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8852">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8853">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8854">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8855">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8856">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8857">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8858">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8859">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8860">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8861">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8862">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8863">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8864">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8865">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8866">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8867">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8868">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8894">Polen REGON-getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8894">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8895">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8896">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8896">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8897">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8897">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8898">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8898">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8899">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8899">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8900">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8900">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8901">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8902">9-cijferig of 14-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8902">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8903">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8904">negen cijfers of 14-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8904">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8905">negen cijfers of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8905">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8906">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8906">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8907">afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8907">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8908">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8908">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8909">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8910">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8911">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8912">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8913">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8914">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_polish_regon_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8915">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8916">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8917">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8917">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8923">regonnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8923">regon number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8925">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8925">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8926">bedrijfs-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8926">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8927">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8927">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8928">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8928">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8929">numerieke statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8929">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8930">getal regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8930">numeru regon</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8933">Btw-nummer polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8933">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8934">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8934">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8935">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8935">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8936">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8936">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8937">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8937">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8938">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8938">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8939">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8939">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8940">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8941">11 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8941">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8942">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8943">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8943">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8945">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8945">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8946">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8947">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8948">Met de  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8948">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8949">Er wordt een  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8979">Portugal burgerkaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8979">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8980">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8981">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8981">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8982">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8983">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8983">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8984">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8985">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8986">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8987">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8988">De normale expressie Regex_portugal_citizen_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-8989">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_portugal_citizen_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9009">Portugese nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9010">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9011">twee patronen: twee letters gevolgd door 5-8 cijfers met speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9012">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9013">Patroon 1: Twee letters gevolgd door 5/6 met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9014">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9015">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9016">Vijf of zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9017">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9018">EÃ©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9019">Patroon 2: Een letter gevolgd door 6/8 cijfers met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9020">EÃ©n letter (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9021">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9022">Zes of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9023">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9024">EÃ©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9024">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9025">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9026">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9026">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9027">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9028">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9029">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9030">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9162">Portugal paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9163">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9164">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zes cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9165">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9166">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9167">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9168">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9168">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9169">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9170">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9171">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9172">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9173">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9174">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9175">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9176">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9177">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9178">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9205">Portugese belastingidentificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9206">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9207">negen cijfers met optionele spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9208">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9209">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9210">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9211">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9212">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9213">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9213">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9214">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9215">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9215">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9216">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9217">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9218">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9219">Er wordt een  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9220">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9221">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9246">RoemeniÃ« rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9247">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9248">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9249">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9250">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9251">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9252">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9252">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9253">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9254">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9254">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9255">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9256">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9257">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9258">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9387">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9388">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9392">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9393">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9394">13 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9395">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9396">Ã©Ã©n cijfer van 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9397">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum (YYMMDD) vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9398">twee cijfers, die 01-52 of 99 kunnen zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9399">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9400">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9401">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9402">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9403">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9404">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9405">Er wordt een  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9406">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9407">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9458">RoemeniÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9459">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9460">acht of negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9461">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9462">acht of negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9463">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9464">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9465">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9466">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9467">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9468">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9469">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (voorbeeld- 01 FEB/FEB 10) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9470">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9471">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9472">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9507">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9508">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9508">Definition</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9510">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9510">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9511">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9511">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9528">Rusland paspoortnummer internationaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9528">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9529">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9529">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9530">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9530">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9531">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9531">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9532">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9532">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9533">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9533">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9534">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9534">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9535">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9536">negencijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9536">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9537">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9538">negencijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9538">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9539">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9539">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9540">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9540">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9541">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9541">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9542">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9543">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9544">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9545">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9545">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9546">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9547">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9547">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9564">Nationale id van Saudi-ArabiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9565">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9566">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9567">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9568">10 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9569">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9570">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9571">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9572">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9573">De normale expressie Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9574">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9581">NRIC-nummer (National Registration Identity Card) van Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9582">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9583">negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9584">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9585">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9586">de letter "F", "G", "S" of "T" (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9587">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9587">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9588">een alfabetisch vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9589">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9590">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9591">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9592">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9593">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9594">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_singapore_nric gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9595">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9596">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9597">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9598">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9609">Slowakije-rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9610">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9611">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9612">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9613">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9614">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9615">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9615">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9616">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9617">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9617">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9618">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9619">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9620">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9621">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9747">Persoonlijk nummer slowakije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9748">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9749">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9750">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9751">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9752">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9753">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9754">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9755">negen of tien cijfers met optionele backslash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9756">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9757">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9758">optionele slash (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9759">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9760">een optioneel vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9761">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9762">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9762">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9763">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9764">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9765">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9766">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9767">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9768">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9815">Slowakije paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9816">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9817">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9818">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9819">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9820">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9821">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9821">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9822">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9823">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9824">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9825">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9826">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9827">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9828">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9829">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9851">Nummer van sloveens rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9852">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9853">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9854">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9855">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9855">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9856">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9857">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9857">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9858">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9859">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9860">Met de normale  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3e2d3-9861">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3e2d3-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
